case_description: This case pertains to a consumer complaint regarding problems with a machine supplied by the company, which includes allegations of insufficient service support. The consumer contends that the machine was defective; however, the company reaffirms its commitment to providing high-quality products and comprehensive customer service. The central issues will revolve around assessing the machineâ€™s condition upon delivery and the adequacy of the support offered. The company is fully prepared to address these matters and showcase its commitment to customer satisfaction and product quality.
name: CC/323/2021

case_description: The distributor has submitted a petition under Section 9 to the Gujarat High Court seeking to secure the outstanding amount. Additionally, a request has been made under Section 11 to the Supreme Court for the appointment of an arbitrator to facilitate the resolution of the dispute.
name: CC/19/2023

case_description: This case involves a consumer complaint alleging issues with a machine provided by the company, including claims of inadequate service support. While the consumer asserts that the machine was faulty, the company stands by its commitment to delivering high-quality products and ensuring robust customer support. The key issues will focus on verifying the condition of the machine at delivery and the effectiveness of the support provided. The company is prepared to address these concerns and demonstrate its dedication to customer satisfaction and product excellence.
name: CC/442/2023
